channel.title: Comments on: Happy Weekend: Breakfast with Korea, Supper with Afghanistan
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Jean Oehm Miller
item.dc:creator: Jean Oehm Miller
item.description: Wish I could be there to participate in this event & try all that great free food! Great theme: "Superstition." I'd love to find out more about what others find "scary or good." Let us know if you find some interesting facts. Sad that so many of the G-20 countries are not participating. Why do you think that is? Only Korea and Indonesia participated from the G-20 list?
item.content:encoded: Wish I could be there to participate in this event & try all that great free food! Great theme: “Superstition.” I’d love to find out more about what others find “scary or good.” Let us know if you find some interesting facts. Sad that so many of the G-20 countries are not participating. Why do you think that is? Only Korea and Indonesia participated from the G-20 list?
